basicInfo.name: Shane
basicInfo.flavor: Shane almost lost her body to the demon when her powers went berserk, but she was able to seal it just in time. She carries the seal everywhere with her, just to be safe.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Demon Slaying
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 570% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 690% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Damage: Grants an additional 50% Damage Boost for each debuff on the target. [Max 4 Stack(s)]

Passive.name: Demonic Power
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Resistance. [Always Active]
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s) upon using any attack 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Magic Resistance to 29%.
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 41%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Single Enemy
 - Adds Damage: Grants an additional 20% Damage Boost for each debuff on the target. [Max 4 Stack(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Sieg, members of the Holy Cross Crusaders, Orly, Aquila, grilled fish, soft-boiled eggs, mushrooms, silence
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Dellons, demons, loud noise, overeating, overly bright light, obtuseness, meddling, unreserved people
profile.story: The Crusaders thought that they needed demonic powers to fight against demons. Shane was their first attempt to give a human demonic powers.

basicInfo.name: Shane
basicInfo.flavor: Shane became a demon-slaying agent with the Crusaders. Her demonic powers allow her to cut through enemies with ease.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
